Is a backdoor set valid?

is_valid_backdoor.Rd

Checks whether Z is a valid backdoor adjustment set for X --> Y.

Usage

is_valid_backdoor(
  cg,
  x = NULL,
  y = NULL,
  Z = NULL,
  x_index = NULL,
  y_index = NULL,
  Z_index = NULL
)

Arguments

cg

A caugi_graph object.

x, y

Single node (name/expression) or 1-based index via x_index,y_index.

Z

Optional node set for conditioning; or Z_index for indices.

x_index, y_index, Z_index

Optional 1-based indices (exclusive with name args).

Value

Logical scalar.
